text: [Music]
this is my workshop uh introduction to
distributed systems with csharpen.net we
have all of these fantastic patterns and
protocols now that exist to uh basically
to get two different services talking to
one another in this workshop we're going
to talk about http and some of the
patterns that run on top of that we'll
talk about rest we'll talk about graphql
we've got a whole section at bad
patterns that use message queues publish
subscribe rabbitmq those kinds of things
we're going to talk about a grpc which
is a format camera google along with the
protocol buffers which is a very very
fast way of encoding data for sending it
over the network and we're going to look
at signalr which is a fantastic asp.net
library for doing real-time
notifications popping up in a browser if
you're a net developer you know your way
around c-sharp and you're interested in
learning what are these patterns you
know how do they work when do you use
them and what are they good at you know
why should you use these in your
applications this workshop is for you
it's happening at ndc conferences hope
to see you there
[Music]
